objects.ground: A soft leather jacket lies neatly folded on the ground.

extras.text: Butter-soft light tan leather makes a jacket that buttons down the front with pretty bronze buttons.  It has short capsleeves and a dapper collar, but other than that, it's quite plain.

objects.ground: A studded leather jacket has been abandoned here.

extras.text: This jacket is made of dark brown leather, studded all over with bits of metal to make it more protective.  The hems are all double-stitched with wax thread, to make it durable.

objects.ground: A pair of leather gloves lies neatly folded out of the way.

extras.text: Beige leather makes up these soft gloves.  They're made to fit just about anybody's hands.

objects.ground: A leather cap lies right in the way.

extras.text: This is a dapper, smart-looking black leather cap, very fashionable.  A very small bill sticks out from its front.

objects.ground: A pair of leather pants is lying in a heap on the ground.

extras.text: These pants are full-cut, made from good solid tan leather.  Though hardly fashionable, at least with the dignified crowd, they're oddly appealing to most people.  At least they'll afford their wearer's legs with some protection.

objects.ground: A pair of leather sleeves lies curled up together on the ground.

extras.text: Cylinders of leather form a pair of sleeves, designed to hook onto a vest of whatever type you please.  They're made of tan leather, and are completely unornamented.

objects.ground: A pair of leather boots stands off to the side.

extras.text: These work boots are made of dark brown leather.  They go about calf-high, and though they're unornamented, the leather is finely worked and tooled along its edges.  They have no cuffs, and a very low heel -- quite suitable for anybody wanting some basic protection.

objects.ground: A bronze breast plate lies on the ground, abandoned.

extras.text: This large, flat disc of bronze is designed to strap around its wearer. Though it is unornamented and undecorated, it does have a few little dents in it -- perhaps from a previous wearer?

objects.ground: A pair of bronze gauntlets lies here, glinting dully.

extras.text: These bronze gauntlets are designed to strap around their wearer's hands. Though far from pretty, with their simple, stark tooling and many little dents, they are certainly aesthetically pleasing to most people.

objects.ground: A bronze helmet lies just out of the way.

extras.text: A simple bronze helmet, this armor for the head hasn't got any decorations on it.  It covers the head, and that's about it, with no nose-guard, or any flaps that protect the neck or ears.  Just a simple cap of metal.

objects.ground: A pair of bronze leggings lies neatly arranged, out of the way.

extras.text: These large pieces of metal are designed to be strapped around their wearer's legs. They're made of good, heavy bronze, and don't have that many dents.

objects.ground: A pair of bronze sleeves lies cupped here on the ground.

extras.text: These cylinders of lightly patina'd bronze are designed to be strapped onto whatever vest or breastplast their wearer desires.  They're not decorated, aside from some very stark tooling around their edges.

objects.ground: A pair of iron bracers lie here, beginning to rust.

extras.text: These bracers, made of cold black iron, are quite heavy.  They're designed to strap onto the forearms of their wearer by way of leather straps.  There are only a few little dents in their surface, which is tooled along its edges.

objects.ground: A small iron helm has been dropped right in the way.

extras.text: This simple little iron helm is made almost completely without ornamentation, aside from very simple tooling along its edge.  Leather straps hold it onto its wearer's head.  It's also quite heavy and probably very hot!

objects.ground: A pair of iron gauntlets rests on the ground.

extras.text: These black iron gauntlets are designed to strap onto their wearer's hands. Mostly, they protect the back of the hand.  Light tooling is worked across their edges.

objects.ground: A set of iron sleeves lies on the ground.

extras.text: These heavy black cylinders of iron are designed to strap around their wearer's forearms.  They bear light dents, testifying to their effectiveness, but other than that, are unmarked.

objects.ground: Some iron-banded boots have been left here.

extras.text: This is one heavy pair of boots!  Black iron strips are bolted to a pair of black leather boots, making them immensely protective as well as cumbersome. They are unornamented, though they do bear some light dents, testimony to their usefulness.

objects.ground: A set of iron leggings lies here unattended.

extras.text: These heavy plates of iron are designed to strap around their wearer's legs, forming strong and durable protection.  The knees feature cleverly worked joints, though apart from this, they're quite plain, just thick black iron.

objects.ground: A small iron girth lies at your feet.

extras.text: This wide belt is made up of lots of slim, long pieces of heavy, cold black iron banded together with wire.  It clasps at the front with a simple iron buckle.  Other than the buckle's tooling, it is not decorated.

objects.ground: An iron breast plate lies here.

extras.text: This large disc of cold black iron is designed to strap across its wearer's chest by way of leather straps.  It's tooled across its edges, but other than that, it's undecorated.

objects.ground: A steel breast plate shines up at you from the ground.

extras.text: A shiny disc of polished steel makes the main part of this piece of armor. Tooled across its edges with a scrolling design, everything about it, from the subtle decorations to the fine straps, makes it look expensive and highly effective.  There are only a few little dents in its surface to mar its mirror-like perfection.

objects.ground: A chain mail shirt lies in a heap on the ground.

extras.text: Thousands of little steel links go into the making of this heavy shirt. It slips over the head easily, and looks like it'd fit just about anybody. The undecorated shirt shines and clinks at every motion of its wearer.

objects.ground: A scalemail jacket is lying on the ground.

extras.text: Hundreds of little fish-scale-shaped pieces of steel make up this attractive jacket.  It ripples with every lithe movement.  Though it isn't decorated, the little scales make it look functional as well as aesthetically pleasing.

objects.ground: A vest made of iron rings lies heaped on the floor.

extras.text: Dozens of large rings made of iron are sewn onto a thick quilted vest, making it far more protective and durable.  It looks like it's in fine condition for a piece of slightly used armor.

objects.ground: A small wooden shield has been abandoned here.

extras.text: A small wooden disc bolted along its edges, this shield is designed to be held close to the body.  A pair of leather handles on its back allows its user to hold it in a variety of ways.  The shield itself is undecorated.

objects.ground: A small, but sturdy, iron shield has been left here.

extras.text: A small disc of heavy black iron makes up this shield.  Though it's heavy, its size makes it easier to use.  Leather straps provide handholds against the back of the undecorated piece of metal.

objects.ground: A large steel shield has been left here.

extras.text: Beaten steel makes up the main part of this door-shaped shield.  Large enough to protect most of its user's body, it is only lightly decorated along its edges with simple tooling.  Three leather straps along its back provide a secure grip.

objects.ground: A long white feather lies here in the dirt.

extras.text: The fluffy white feather is quite long, with a red shaft. It looks suspiciously like a writing utensil! (Hint : you need something to write on...then while carrying both, type: write on paper with quill OR you may hold the quill and type: write paper)

rooms.name: The Global Holding Room
rooms.description: Arrrghhhhh!  How did you get in here!?  You shall suffer an enternity of pain for your trespasses!  This room should only be used as a holding room for automated quests and triggers.
